item.title: Raytracing in One Weekend on Ebiten
item.description: I am going to profile it to figure out why this version is much slower than the Zig version. https://raytracing.github.io/books/RayTracingInOneWeekend.html https://ebiten.org

item.title: Ray Tracing in One Weekend on WebAssembly
item.description: samples: div.raytracing-content { } canvas { width: 800px; height: 356px; image-rendering: pixelated; image-rendering: crisp-edges; } import { instantiate } from '/wasm.js'; const width = 320; const height = 180; const samplesElem = document.querySelector('.samples'); console.log(samplesElem); (async function start() { const memory = new WebAssembly.Memory({initial: 40, maximum: 40}) const importObject = { 'env': { 'memory': memory, }, }; const { instance, module } = await instantiate('/raytracing.wasm', importObject); const exports = instance.
